title: 820-000165 No sound
message:
Hello,
I have 820-00165 water damage, I replaced SMC + cleaned ME region.
The device came back to life, every thing working good.
But no sound, the speaker logo isn't in gray and i can adjust the volume level, but no sound coming out.
I replaced the IO no change
thanks

title: 820-000165 No sound
message:
Heaphones also no sound?
In System Preferrences -> Sound, macOS detects change from speakers to headphones?

Machine chimes when turns on?
Try PRAM reset, if not.

title: 820-000165 No sound
message: Machine don't chimes, i tried PRAM reset no result. I will check with the headphone

title: 820-000165 No sound
message:
For chime, audio codec is not involved.
I heard chime even on machines which doesn't detect audio codec at all.

In fact, I have one 00165 on the desk with such problem.
No audio codec seen by macOS; also no chime.
But changing LIO board, I got chime; still no audio codec detected.
Repair is underway...

title: 820-000165 No sound
message:
Shit happens.
The LIO board I used for test, has bad sound section.
I've just tested with another LIO board and Youtube plays now perfect.

title: 820-000165 No sound
message:
When i plug the headphone it is not working, it is not detecting the plugged headphones.
I can't install macOS, always i have an error, the installation stopped.
I think i have a problem with the bios, how to find an original fresh bios to install ?

title: 820-000165 No sound
message: I can boot to high Sierra from external hard drive

title: 820-000165 No sound
message:
Did you replace LIO flex too?

Speakers, SPDIF, or headphones, what appear on Audio output devices?

title: 820-000165 No sound
message:
Headphones recognized when inserted, get sound?

If speakers appear and volume bar reacts, then check power for sound amplifier.
Also test with another speaker.

title: 820-000165 No sound
message:
Headphone not recognized when inserted, no sound in it.
Volume bar appear as speaker and reacts, I tested with another speaker the same problem.
Please give me the sound amplifier IC name and net name 
thanks

title: 820-000165 No sound
message:
Only right speaker amplifier is on MLB, U6410.
Compare SPKRAMP_SHDN_L level with a good working board.

If headphones not recognized, you still have a problem with LIO board.
